definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: When used within a module, for example, the error message includes the module name and line number.
sentences.chinese: 當在模塊中使用時，錯誤消息中包含模塊名稱和行號。

sentences.english: Additionally, a row number is assigned to each row.
sentences.chinese: 此外，每個行被賦予一個行號。

sentences.english: An editor that displays line numbers will help you find errors quickly.
sentences.chinese: 顯示行號的編輯器能幫助您快速找到錯誤。

sentences.english: Added file and line numbers to all sexp nodes.
sentences.chinese: 爲每個sexp節點新增的文件和行號。

sentences.english: The line numbers in the left column represent the original source as seen by the user.
sentences.chinese: 左列中的行號表示用戶所見的初始源。

sentences.english: Material changes were made to steel for airplanes line number 814 and on.
sentences.chinese: 行號爲814及以後的飛機已經做好材料升級的準備。

sentences.english: The line number displayed may not always be where the actual error originated.
sentences.chinese: 錯誤消息中顯示的行號不一定是出現錯誤的實際位置。

sentences.english: The left-hand column shows the line number.
Otherwise, from the value of the starting line number.
sentences.chinese: 否則從以該值爲行號的起始值。

sentences.english: It includes basics such as line numbering and cursor and character positions and counts.
sentences.chinese: 它包括基礎知識，如行號和遊標和字符的位置和計數。

sentences.english: Given the column number and the row number, the formula works like a charm.
sentences.chinese: 指定列號和行號後，這些公式將發揮它們的作用。
